stepTitle: Working as an insurance salesperson, Ilya earns a base salary plus a commission on each new policy. Therefore, Ilya’s weekly income 𝐼, depends on the number of new policies, 𝑛, he sells during the week. Last week he sold $$3$$ new policies, and earned $760 for the week. The week before, he sold $$5$$ new policies and earned $920. Find an equation for 𝐼(𝑛), and interpret the meaning of the components of the equation.
